slug: /171
title: "This Week In React #171: Expo, React Conf, React 19 preview, Next.js, React-Email, Storybook, Panda, Nexar, React-Query, TypeScript, Vocs, Skottie, Harmony, VisionOS..."

segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!

segments.content: This week the official React conf has been announced. Co-hosted with Callstack, I hope for React Native to be well-covered! React 19 is coming, and we continue to get sneak peeks into upcoming features such as proper Web Components support. I wouldn't be surprised to see it being released during the conf alongside React Forget 🤞.
segments.sourceMdx: This week the official React conf has been announced. Co-hosted with Callstack, I hope for React Native to be well-covered! React 19 is coming, and we continue to get sneak peeks into upcoming features such as proper Web Components support. I wouldn't be surprised to see it being released during the conf alongside React Forget 🤞.
segments.translated_content: 本周官方React大会已官宣。与Callstack联合举办，期待React Native能得到充分覆盖！React 19即将到来，我们持续窥见其新特性，例如完善的Web Components支持。若在大会期间与React Forget同步发布，我毫不意外🤞。

segments.content: In other news, this week is full of interesting articles and releases, including Next.js, React-Emails...
segments.sourceMdx: In other news, this week is full of interesting articles and releases, including Next.js, React-Emails...
segments.translated_content: 其他动态方面，本周涌现了大量精彩文章和版本更新，包括Next.js、React-Emails...

segments.content: The React Native world has woken up with an impressive Expo SDK 50 release, and Expo Router v3 becoming the very first universal full-stack React framework.
segments.sourceMdx: The React Native world has woken up with an impressive Expo SDK 50 release, and Expo Router v3 becoming the very first universal full-stack React framework.
segments.translated_content: React Native领域随着Expo SDK 50的惊艳发布而苏醒，Expo Router v3成为首个全栈通用的React框架。

segments.content: ## 💸 Sponsor
segments.sourceMdx: ## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}

segments.content: [![Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](/emails/issues/171/axiom.jpg)](https://axiom.co/vercel)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](/emails/issues/171/axiom.jpg)](https://axiom.co/vercel)

segments.content: **[Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](https://axiom.co/vercel)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](https://axiom.co/vercel)**

segments.content: 😴 Sleep peacefully knowing that Axiom’s zero-config observability for Vercel projects has you covered.
segments.sourceMdx: 😴 Sleep peacefully knowing that Axiom’s zero-config observability for Vercel projects has you covered.
segments.translated_content: 😴 高枕无忧，Axiom为Vercel项目提供的零配置可观测性为您保驾护航。

segments.content:
* Use Axiom's pre-built dashboard for an overview across all your Vercel logs and vitals, drill down to specific projects and deployments, and get insight on how functions are performing with a single click.
* [next-axiom](https://github.com/axiomhq/next-axiom) allows you to send logs and events from any part of your Next.js projects - client, edge, or server-side - without any special configuration.
* Easily send structured logs directly from your code and analyze them together with Vercel logs.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Use Axiom's pre-built dashboard for an overview across all your Vercel logs and vitals, drill down to specific projects and deployments, and get insight on how functions are performing with a single click.
- [next-axiom](https://github.com/axiomhq/next-axiom) allows you to send logs and events from any part of your Next.js projects - client, edge, or server-side - without any special configuration.
- Easily send structured logs directly from your code and analyze them together with Vercel logs.
segments.translated_content:
- 使用Axiom预建仪表盘纵览所有Vercel日志与性能指标，一键深入特定项目与部署，洞悉函数执行状况
- [next-axiom](https://github.com/axiomhq/next-axiom)支持从Next.js项目的任何环节（客户端、边缘或服务端）直接发送日志与事件，无需特殊配置
- 轻松从代码发送结构化日志，并与Vercel日志协同分析

segments.content: Axiom efficiently captures 100% of your event data so you’ll never have to worry about sampling or retention, and you’ll never have to guess what your users are experiencing.
segments.sourceMdx: Axiom efficiently captures 100% of your event data so you’ll never have to worry about sampling or retention, and you’ll never have to guess what your users are experiencing.
segments.translated_content: Axiom高效捕获100%事件数据，从此无需担忧采样率与留存问题，用户真实体验尽在掌握。

segments.content: **PS**: [I use it myself to monitor the newsletter signups](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1528666563452317696) 😉
segments.sourceMdx: **PS**: [I use it myself to monitor the newsletter signups](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1528666563452317696) 😉
segments.translated_content: **附**：[我本人用它监控简报订阅情况](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1528666563452317696) 😉

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.content: [![Next.js App Router Training](/emails/issues/171/appRouterTraining.jpg)](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Next.js App Router Training](/emails/issues/171/appRouterTraining.jpg)](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)

segments.content: **[Next.js App Router Training](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Next.js App Router Training](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)**

segments.content: A playground with a quite exhaustive list of interactive demos about Next.js features. This is a great resource to understand how the Next.js App Router behaves by actually seeing it running with a convenient way to browse the related code.
segments.sourceMdx: A playground with a quite exhaustive list of interactive demos about Next.js features. This is a great resource to understand how the Next.js App Router behaves by actually seeing it running with a convenient way to browse the related code.
segments.translated_content: 这个演练场汇集了Next.js功能的交互式演示大全。通过实时运行效果与便捷的代码浏览，是理解App Router行为模式的绝佳资源。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Accelerate your workflow with MightyMeld, a visual dev tool for React codebases. Drag, drop, click, and prompt your UI into place while you hand-code the rest of it.](https://www.mightymeld.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact4\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=1\&utm_content=top)
* 📅 [React Conf 2024:](https://conf.react.dev/) the official conf is back May 15-16 in Henderson (Nevada/USA), in collaboration with Callstack.
* 👀 [React core - Web Components / custom element support is ready for React 19](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11347#issuecomment-1899140345)
* 👀 [Nexar: application architecture for Next.js App Router apps](https://nexar.dev/): An opinionated set of patterns and conventions to build scalable Next.js apps, including a full open-source application.
* 🐦 [React-Forget is written in TypeScript/Babel. It will eventually be rewritten in Rust later, or compiled to native with Static Hermes!](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1747640983980806466) 🙉
* 📜 [New client-side hooks coming to React 19](https://marmelab.com/blog/2024/01/23/react-19-new-hooks.html): Overview of new React hooks and APIs coming in the next major that you will be able to use without a framework.
* 📜 [The Query Options API](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/the-query-options-api): Dominik explains the advantages of removing React-Query overloads in v5, and using a single unified options object that you can reuse across all React-Query APIs thanks to TypeScript duck typing. The usage of a fancy TypeScript DataTag technique greatly improves the DX 🙉.
* 📜 [Panda v1 Roadmap](https://www.adebayosegun.com/blog/panda-v1-roadmap): the CSS-in-JS lib is progressing toward a v1 release. It has already optimized its runtime and integrated Lightning CSS. Remaining tasks include Panda Studio (to vizualize design tokens), opacity modifiers, container queries, config validation…
* 📜 [Wrangling Tuple Types](https://kyleshevlin.com/wrangling-tuple-types/): Explains why you might want to use TypeScript “as const” while returning tuples from custom React hooks.
* 📜 [Build a Next.js app in Storybook with React Server Components and Mock Service Worker](https://storybook.js.org/blog/build-a-nextjs-app-with-rsc-msw-storybook/): The RSC support coming with Storybook 8 permits to develop a full Next.js app in isolation.
* 📜 [Build an app with Remix and Bun](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/build-an-app-with-remix-and-bun): It’s possible to use Bun at runtime, but for now you have to keep building the Remix app with Node.
* 📜 [Harmony - A new kind of color picker for React](https://polar.sh/emilwidlund/posts/a-new-kind-of-color-picker-with-react-typescript): New fancy React color picker package, that matches multiple colors together according to harmonies.
* 📜 [RSC is React Server + Component](https://bobaekang.com/blog/rsc-is-react-server-plus-component/): Gives you an interesting mental model to understand RSCs.
* 📜 [From Next.js to Rails then Elixir: My journey through React.js burnout](https://dev.to/danielbergholz/from-nextjs-to-rails-then-elixir-my-journey-through-reactjs-burnout-h8d)
* 📜 [Detailed React. Reconciliation, Renderers, Fiber, Virtual Tree](https://blog.frontend-almanac.com/JqtGelofzm1)
* 📜 [Shining a light on Caustics with Shaders and React Three Fiber](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/caustics-in-webgl/)
* 📜 [Mastering React and OpenLayers Integration: A Comprehensive Guide](https://mxd.codes/articles/how-to-create-a-web-map-with-open-layers-and-react)
* 📜 [Optimizing images for Next.js sites with imgproxy and docker](https://mxd.codes/articles/optimizing-images-for-next-js-sites-with-imgproxy-and-docker)
* 📦 [dream-css-tool - styled-components, but without a client runtime. Built for Next.js](https://github.com/joshwcomeau/dream-css-tool): Josh Comeau explores creating his own CSS-in-JS lb.
* 📦 [React Email 2.0 - New preview experience, improved performance, CodeBlock component](https://resend.com/blog/react-email-2)…
* 📦 [Next.js 14.1 - Improving DX, Turbopack, self-hosting, history APIs, image component, parallel and intercepted routes…](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14-1)
* 📦 [Zustand 4.5 - getInitialState to prevent hydration mismatches](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.5.0)
* 📦 [Relay 16.2 - @preloadable directive](https://github.com/facebook/relay/releases/tag/v16.2.0)
* 📦 [Astro 4.2 - Prerendering using Speculation Rules API, customizable image optimization](https://astro.build/blog/astro-420/)…
* 📦 [vocs - Minimal Documentation Framework, powered by React + Vite](https://github.com/wevm/vocs)
* 📦 [ReScript 11.0 - React lazy components](https://rescript-lang.org/blog/release-11-0-0)
* 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Next.js App Router Caching: Explained!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBlSe8tvg4U)
* 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Deploying Next.js to Vercel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiiGjB2AxqA)
* 🎥 [Ben Holmes - React form validation explained - Next.js and Astro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwEkvie79xI)

- 👀 [React core - Web Components / custom element support is ready for React 19](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11347#issuecomment-1899140345)
- 👀 [Nexar: application architecture for Next.js App Router apps](https://nexar.dev/): An opinionated set of patterns and conventions to build scalable Next.js apps, including a full open-source application.
- 🐦 [React-Forget is written in TypeScript/Babel. It will eventually be rewritten in Rust later, or compiled to native with Static Hermes!](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1747640983980806466) 🙉
- 📜 [New client-side hooks coming to React 19](https://marmelab.com/blog/2024/01/23/react-19-new-hooks.html): Overview of new React hooks and APIs coming in the next major that you will be able to use without a framework.
- 📜 [The Query Options API](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/the-query-options-api): Dominik explains the advantages of removing React-Query overloads in v5, and using a single unified options object that you can reuse across all React-Query APIs thanks to TypeScript duck typing. The usage of a fancy TypeScript DataTag technique greatly improves the DX 🙉.
- 📜 [Panda v1 Roadmap](https://www.adebayosegun.com/blog/panda-v1-roadmap): the CSS-in-JS lib is progressing toward a v1 release. It has already optimized its runtime and integrated Lightning CSS. Remaining tasks include Panda Studio (to vizualize design tokens), opacity modifiers, container queries, config validation…
- 📜 [Wrangling Tuple Types](https://kyleshevlin.com/wrangling-tuple-types/): Explains why you might want to use TypeScript “as const” while returning tuples from custom React hooks.
- 📜 [Build a Next.js app in Storybook with React Server Components and Mock Service Worker](https://storybook.js.org/blog/build-a-nextjs-app-with-rsc-msw-storybook/): The RSC support coming with Storybook 8 permits to develop a full Next.js app in isolation.
- 📜 [Build an app with Remix and Bun](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/build-an-app-with-remix-and-bun): It’s possible to use Bun at runtime, but for now you have to keep building the Remix app with Node.
- 📜 [Harmony - A new kind of color picker for React](https://polar.sh/emilwidlund/posts/a-new-kind-of-color-picker-with-react-typescript): New fancy React color picker package, that matches multiple colors together according to harmonies.
- 📜 [RSC is React Server + Component](https://bobaekang.com/blog/rsc-is-react-server-plus-component/): Gives you an interesting mental model to understand RSCs.
- 📜 [From Next.js to Rails then Elixir: My journey through React.js burnout](https://dev.to/danielbergholz/from-nextjs-to-rails-then-elixir-my-journey-through-reactjs-burnout-h8d)
- 📜 [Detailed React. Reconciliation, Renderers, Fiber, Virtual Tree](https://blog.frontend-almanac.com/JqtGelofzm1)
- 📜 [Shining a light on Caustics with Shaders and React Three Fiber](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/caustics-in-webgl/)
- 📜 [Mastering React and OpenLayers Integration: A Comprehensive Guide](https://mxd.codes/articles/how-to-create-a-web-map-with-open-layers-and-react)
- 📜 [Optimizing images for Next.js sites with imgproxy and docker](https://mxd.codes/articles/optimizing-images-for-next-js-sites-with-imgproxy-and-docker)
- 📦 [dream-css-tool - styled-components, but without a client runtime. Built for Next.js](https://github.com/joshwcomeau/dream-css-tool): Josh Comeau explores creating his own CSS-in-JS lb.
- 📦 [React Email 2.0 - New preview experience, improved performance, CodeBlock component](https://resend.com/blog/react-email-2)…
- 📦 [Next.js 14.1 - Improving DX, Turbopack, self-hosting, history APIs, image component, parallel and intercepted routes…](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14-1)
- 📦 [Zustand 4.5 - getInitialState to prevent hydration mismatches](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.5.0)
- 📦 [Relay 16.2 - @preloadable directive](https://github.com/facebook/relay/releases/tag/v16.2.0)
- 📦 [Astro 4.2 - Prerendering using Speculation Rules API, customizable image optimization](https://astro.build/blog/astro-420/)…

- 📦 [ReScript 11.0 - React lazy components](https://rescript-lang.org/blog/release-11-0-0)
- 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Next.js App Router Caching: Explained!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBlSe8tvg4U)
- 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Deploying Next.js to Vercel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiiGjB2AxqA)
- 🎥 [Ben Holmes - React form validation explained - Next.js and Astro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwEkvie79xI)
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [使用MightyMeld加速您的工作流程，这是一款针对React代码库的可视化开发工具。通过拖放、点击和提示来调整UI界面，同时手动编写其余代码。](https://www.mightymeld.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact4&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=1&utm_content=top)
- 📅 [React Conf 2024：](https://conf.react.dev/)官方大会将于5月15-16日在美国内华达州亨德森市回归，与Callstack合作举办。
- 👀 [React核心 - Web组件/自定义元素支持已为React 19做好准备](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11347#issuecomment-1899140345)
- 👀 [Nexar：面向Next.js应用路由的应用架构](https://nexar.dev/)：一套包含完整开源应用的约定式开发规范，用于构建可扩展的Next.js应用。
- 🐦 [React-Forget采用TypeScript/Babel编写，未来将用Rust重写或通过Static Hermes编译为原生代码！](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1747640983980806466) 🙉
- 📜 [React 19即将引入的新客户端Hook](https://marmelab.com/blog/2024/01/23/react-19-new-hooks.html)：概述无需框架即可使用的新React Hook和API。
- 📜 [查询选项API](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/the-query-options-api)：Dominik解析React-Query v5通过TypeScript鸭子类型采用统一配置对象的优势，运用DataTag技术显著提升开发者体验 🙉。
- 📜 [Panda v1路线图](https://www.adebayosegun.com/blog/panda-v1-roadmap)：该CSS-in-JS库正朝着v1版本迈进，已优化运行时并集成Lightning CSS，剩余工作包括Panda Studio可视化工具、透明度修饰符、容器查询等功能。
- 📜 [元组类型处理技巧](https://kyleshevlin.com/wrangling-tuple-types/)：解析在React自定义Hook中返回元组时使用TypeScript "as const"的优势。
- 📜 [在Storybook中构建支持RSC和MSW的Next.js应用](https://storybook.js.org/blog/build-a-nextjs-app-with-rsc-msw-storybook/)：Storybook 8的RSC支持实现在隔离环境中开发完整Next.js应用。
- 📜 [使用Remix和Bun构建应用](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/build-an-app-with-remix-and-bun)：目前可在运行时使用Bun，但构建阶段仍需依赖Node。
- 📜 [Harmony - 新型React色彩选择器](https://polar.sh/emilwidlund/posts/a-new-kind-of-color-picker-with-react-typescript)：能根据色彩协调原理自动匹配颜色的创新组件库。
- 📜 [RSC是React服务端+组件](https://bobaekang.com/blog/rsc-is-react-server-plus-component/)：提供理解服务端组件的思维模型。
- 📜 [从Next.js到Rails再到Elixir：我的React.js倦怠之旅](https://dev.to/danielbergholz/from-nextjs-to-rails-then-elixir-my-journey-through-reactjs-burnout-h8d)
- 📜 [深度解析React：协调机制、渲染器、Fiber架构与虚拟树](https://blog.frontend-almanac.com/JqtGelofzm1)
- 📜 [使用着色器与React Three Fiber实现焦散光影效果](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/caustics-in-webgl/)
- 📜 [React与OpenLayers集成完全指南](https://mxd.codes/articles/how-to-create-a-web-map-with-open-layers-and-react)
- 📜 [使用imgproxy和docker优化Next.js站点图片](https://mxd.codes/articles/optimizing-images-for-next-js-sites-with-imgproxy-and-docker)
- 📦 [dream-css-tool - 无运行时样式的styled-components替代方案，专为Next.js打造](https://github.com/joshwcomeau/dream-css-tool)：Josh Comeau探索自研CSS-in-JS库。
- 📦 [React Email 2.0 - 新版预览体验、性能提升、CodeBlock组件](https://resend.com/blog/react-email-2)…
- 📦 [Next.js 14.1 - 开发体验优化、Turbopack、自托管方案、历史API、图片组件、并行与拦截路由…](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14-1)
- 📦 [Zustand 4.5 - 新增getInitialState防止hydration不匹配](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.5.0)
- 📦 [Relay 16.2 - 新增@preloadable指令](https://github.com/facebook/relay/releases/tag/v16.2.0)
- 📦 [Astro 4.2 - 基于Speculation Rules API的预渲染、可定制图片优化](https://astro.build/blog/astro-420/)…
- 📦 [vocs - 基于React+Vite的极简文档框架](https://github.com/wevm/vocs)
- 📦 [ReScript 11.0 - 支持React懒加载组件](https://rescript-lang.org/blog/release-11-0-0)
- 🎥 [Lee Robinson解析Next.js应用路由缓存机制](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBlSe8tvg4U)
- 🎥 [Lee Robinson演示Next.js部署到Vercel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiiGjB2AxqA)
- 🎥 [Ben Holmes讲解Next.js与Astro的表单验证](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwEkvie79xI)

segments.content: ## 💸 Sponsor

segments.content: [![FormBuilder SDK for React](/emails/issues/171/tripetto.jpg)](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk)

segments.content: **[FormBuilder SDK for React](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[FormBuilder SDK for React](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsor&utm_campaign=sdk)**

segments.content: A complete form solution for React projects, used by Fortune 500 companies. With easy-to-use open-source components for building and running powerful forms inside your React app. Extensively documented, up in minutes, and deeply customizable.
segments.sourceMdx: A complete form solution for React projects, used by Fortune 500 companies. With easy-to-use open-source components for building and running powerful forms inside your React app. Extensively documented, up in minutes, and deeply customizable.
segments.translated_content: 专为React项目打造的全套表单解决方案，已被财富500强企业采用。提供易用的开源组件，助您在React应用中快速构建强大表单。文档详尽，分钟级部署，支持深度定制。

- 可视化表单构建器；
- 表单运行器用于部署与数据收集；
- 灵活布局（对话式、聊天式等）与样式；
- 可扩展自定义问题类型；
- 完整文档、示例与演示；
- 无外部依赖，支持自托管；
- 免费试用与测试。

segments.content: TWIR exclusive: [Get 25% off your FormBuilder SDK license](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk).
segments.sourceMdx: TWIR exclusive: [Get 25% off your FormBuilder SDK license](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsor&utm_campaign=sdk).

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content: This week’s React Native news is compiled by Benedikt. Feedback, suggestions or news to share? Let me know on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bndkt).
segments.sourceMdx: This week’s React Native news is compiled by Benedikt. Feedback, suggestions or news to share? Let me know on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bndkt).
segments.translated_content: 本周React Native动态由Benedikt整理。反馈建议或新闻投稿？通过[Twitter](https://twitter.com/bndkt)联系我。

segments.content: [![Expo SDK 50](/emails/issues/171/expo50.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50k)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Expo SDK 50](/emails/issues/171/expo50.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50k)

segments.content: **[Expo SDK 50](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Expo SDK 50](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50)**

segments.content: Expo SDK 50 introduces Expo Dev Tools Plugins, comes with new SQLite and Camera APIs, and adds `@expo/fingerprint`, a new way to determine whether an updated JS bundle update is compatible with a given native build. This release also marks the [end of Webpack support](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631) in Expo, which is now deprecated in favor of Metro. The best and most convenient way to get up to speed on Expo 50 is probably to watch Simon rattle through it in about 15 minutes on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shaGaiwu4Fg).
segments.sourceMdx: Expo SDK 50 introduces Expo Dev Tools Plugins, comes with new SQLite and Camera APIs, and adds `@expo/fingerprint`, a new way to determine whether an updated JS bundle update is compatible with a given native build. This release also marks the [end of Webpack support](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631) in Expo, which is now deprecated in favor of Metro. The best and most convenient way to get up to speed on Expo 50 is probably to watch Simon rattle through it in about 15 minutes on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shaGaiwu4Fg).
segments.translated_content: Expo SDK 50推出开发者工具插件，新增SQLite和Camera API，并引入`@expo/fingerprint`用于检测JS包更新与原生构建的兼容性。此版本同时宣告[Webpack支持终止](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631)，推荐迁移至Metro打包工具。快速了解Expo 50的最佳方式是通过Simon的[15分钟YouTube视频](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shaGaiwu4Fg)。

segments.content: [![Expo Router v3](/emails/issues/171/router3.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Expo Router v3](/emails/issues/171/router3.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)

segments.content: **[Expo Router v3](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Expo Router v3](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)**

segments.content: Along with Expo SDK 50, Expo Router v3 has been released. It brings lots of performance and stability improvements and comes with better docs. Most notably, there is now experimental support for building universal server endpoints with API Routes. Expo Router is now the very first universal, full-stack React framework!
segments.sourceMdx: Along with Expo SDK 50, Expo Router v3 has been released. It brings lots of performance and stability improvements and comes with better docs. Most notably, there is now experimental support for building universal server endpoints with API Routes. Expo Router is now the very first universal, full-stack React framework!
segments.translated_content: 伴随Expo SDK 50发布的Expo Router v3带来多项性能与稳定性提升，文档更完善。最值得注意的是新增实验性API Routes功能，支持构建通用服务端端点。Expo Router由此成为首个全栈通用的React框架！

segments.content:
* 💸 [Moropo - Power Up Your Mobile UI Tests with support for 2FA, Google Play, Offline Mode and Tablets ](https://www.moropo.com?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=emails\&utm_campaign=twir-20240124)
* 🐦 [Blur VisionOS demo](https://twitter.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1747976103505821946): `@react-native-community/blur` now supports visionOS.
* 📖 [Expo Docs: Use Bun](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/using-bun/): Bun is (rightfully) all the rage right now and it works great with Expo!
* 📜 [Webpack support in Expo CLI is now deprecated](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631): Time to move to Metro, the universal bundler for React Native and Expo Web. There are also [docs for migrating](https://docs.expo.dev/router/migrate/from-expo-webpack/).
* 📜 [Xcode 15.2 image is now available on EAS Build](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-eas-build-xcode-15.2-image)
* 📜 [React Native Video on visionOS](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/react-native-video-on-visionos/): react-native-video will be able to render video on Apple’s Vision Pro.
* 📜 [Our React Native toolbox: 24 essential tools for developers in 2024](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/24-react-native-tools-for-2024/): Good overview of the tools landscape, from IDEs to debugging and tracing.
* 📜 [How to set video as a background in React Native application](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/video-background-with-react-native-video/)
* 📦 [React Native Storybook v7 alpha](https://github.com/storybookjs/react-native/releases/tag/v7.6.10-alpha.0): Now compatible with the latest Storybook 7.6.1 and featuring dynamic story imports.
* 📦 [react-native-skottie - run Lottie animations using Skia's GPU-accelerated engine](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-skottie)
* 📦 [nativecn-ui - An effort to port the popular shadcn-ui to React Native](https://github.com/Mobilecn-UI/nativecn-ui)
* 📦 [react-native-fast-tflite 1.1 - Upgrades to latest TensorFlow Lite](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-fast-tflite/releases/tag/v1.1.0)
* 🎙️ [RNR 285 - Expo Dominates the App Store (and other news)](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-285-expo-dominates-the-app-store-and-other-news)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 26 - React Server Components for React Native with Szymon Rybczak](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/026-react-server-components-for-react-native-with-szymon-rybczak)
* 🎥 [William Candillon - 3D transformations with React Native Skia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYu3DiWYtL0)
* 🎥 [Catalin Miron - create-expo-app -w with-router-tailwind](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RsFoOlYj-gc\&themeRefresh=1)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - The Worlds Best Apps use React Native](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIMyd5FoKyc)
